languages.text: {n}Взглянув на вас, Паскаль с легким удивлением добавляет:{/n} "Я вспомнил этот язык. Точнее... данная единица его знала. А сейчас вспомнила, что знает". {n}Обратив взгляд на стену, скрывающую в себе священные механизмы, техножрец с сомнением произносит:{/n} "Фиксирую аномалию. Обмен данными отличался от стандартной процедуры регистрации".

{n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは少し驚いた様子であなたを見てからつけ加える。{/n}「ようやくこの言語を思い出しました。というより…このユニットはかつてこの言語を知っていたのです。それを今、知っていたことを思い出したということです」{n}技術司祭は聖なる機械が中に隠されている壁の方を向くと、疑念を口にする。{/n}「例外を記録。標準の登録手順を逸脱したデータ交換を実施」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは少し驚いた様子であなたを見てからつけ加える。{/n}「ようやくこの言語を思い出しました。というより…このユニットはかつてこの言語を知っていたのです。それを今、知っていたことを思い出したということです」{n}技術司祭は聖なる機械が中に隠されている壁の方を向くと、疑念を口にする。{/n}「例外を記録。標準の登録手順を逸脱したデータ交換を実施」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看着你，略带惊讶地开了口。{/n}“我想起来这门语言了。或者更准确地说……我之前了解这门语言，但现在才想起来这件事情。”{n}技术神甫转向内部藏着神圣装置的墙壁，疑惑地自言自语。{/n}“检测到异常，数据交换偏离了标准的登记程序。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看着你，略带惊讶地开了口。{/n}“我想起来这门语言了。或者更准确地说……我之前了解这门语言，但现在才想起来这件事情。”{n}技术祭司转向内部藏着神圣装置的墙壁，疑惑地自言自语。{/n}“正在记录异常，数据交换偏离了标准的登记程序。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, l'air surpris.{/n} « Je me souviens de ce langage à présent. Plus précisément.... cette unité le connaissait. Et se rappelle maintenant l'avoir connu. » {n}Le technoprêtre se tourne vers le mur dissimulant les mécanismes sacrés et semble hésiter un instant avant d'ajouter :{/n} « Anomalie détectée. L'échange de données n'a pas été effectué conformément aux procédures standard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, l'air surpris.{/n} « Je me souviens de ce langage à présent. Plus précisément.... cette unité le connaissait. Et se rappelle maintenant l'avoir connu. » {n}Le technoprêtre se tourne vers le mur dissimulant les mécanismes sacrés et semble hésiter un instant avant d'ajouter :{/n} « Anomalie détectée. L'échange de données n'a pas été effectué conformément aux procédures standard. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te mira y añade con un ligero tono de sorpresa:{/n} «Acabo de recordar este idioma. O para ser más preciso... esta unidad solía conocerlo y ahora recuerda haberlo hecho». {n}El tecnochamán se dirige a la pared que tiene los mecanismos sagrados ocultos y dice dubitativo:{/n} «Detecto una anomalía. No se ha seguido el procedimiento de registro estándar en el intercambio de datos».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te mira y añade con un ligero tono de sorpresa:{/n} «Acabo de recordar este idioma. O para ser más preciso... esta unidad solía conocerlo y ahora recuerda haberlo hecho». {n}El tecnochamán se dirige a la pared que tiene los mecanismos sagrados ocultos y dice dubitativo:{/n} «Detecto una anomalía. No se ha seguido el procedimiento de registro estándar en el intercambio de datos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich an und fügt leicht überrascht hinzu:{/n} "Ich erinnere mich jetzt an diese Sprache. Oder genauer gesagt ... diese Einheit kannte sie einmal. Und erinnert sich jetzt daran, sie gekannt zu haben." {n}Der Techpriester wendet sich der Wand mit den darin verborgenen heiligen Mechanismen zu und sagt in zweifelndem Ton:{/n} "Ich registriere eine Anomalie. Der Datenaustausch ist von der standardmäßigen Registrierungsprozedur abgewichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

Und erinnert sich jetzt daran, sie gekannt zu haben." {n}Der Techpriester wendet sich der Wand mit den darin verborgenen heiligen Mechanismen zu und sagt in zweifelndem Ton:{/n} "Ich registriere eine Anomalie. Der Datenaustausch ist von der standardmäßigen Registrierungsprozedur abgewichen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sana bakıp hafif şaşkınlıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu dili şimdi hatırladım. Daha doğrusu... Bu birim onu eskiden biliyordu, şimdi de onu bildiğini hatırladı." {n}Tekno Rahip, kutsal mekanizmanın içine gizlendiği duvara doğru dönüp şüpheyle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bir anomali kaydediyorum. Veri alışverişi, standart kayıt prosedüründen farklılaşmış."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you and adds with slight surprise,{/n} "I remember this language now. Or more precisely... this unit used to know it. And now it remembers having known it." {n}The Tech-Priest turns toward the wall with the sacred mechanisms concealed inside it, and says doubtfully,{/n} "I am registering an anomaly. The data exchange deviated from the standard registration procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana bakıyor ve hafiften şaşırmış şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Bu dili şimdi hatırladım. Daha doğrusu... Bu birim onu eskiden biliyordu ve şimdi onu bildiğini hatırladı." {n}Tekno Rahip, kutsal mekanizmanın içine gizlendiği duvara doğru dönüyor ve şüpheyle konuşuyor:{/n} "Bir anomali kaydediyorum. Veri alışverişi, standart kayıt prosedüründen farklılaşmış durumda."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
